snippet: Abby Wambach scored her 156th career international goal to move within two of Mia Hamm’s women’s record in the United States’ 4-1 victory over South Korea.
abstract: Abby Wambach scores her 156th career international goal to move within two of Mia Hamm’s women’s record in United States soccer team’s 4-1 victory over South Korea in Foxborough, Mass; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Abby Wambach scored her 156th career international goal to move within two of Mia Hamm’s women’s record in the United States’ 4-1 victory over South Korea.

headline.main: Wambach Closes In on Hamm’s Record
headline.print_headline: Wambach Closes In On Hamm’s Record
